attributes.action: pay war disablement pensioners, the same pensions as back bench MP's They have done more for this country for a lot less money, than anyone sitting in parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Servicemen and women injured while serving Queen and Country and who are medically discharged and are unable to work, should be paid the same pension as back bench MP's. Whether injured in war, training or by disease these people have done more for this country than any any MP. And they deserve a decent living income.

A war pensioner has to fight even after medically discharged, they have to fight the SPVA for pennies, while MP's are given money hand over fist for moat cleaning, porno films, duck houses, gardening and anything beyond the dreams of avarice.
